tabs.description: Note: Items will be displayed in the order specified in this dialog.
tabs.name: ./tabs

listeners.selectionChanged: function(field, value, isChecked) { var tabpanel = field.findParentByType('mtmulticompositefield'); var checkboxes = tabpanel.findByType('selection'); if(isChecked) { checkboxes.forEach(function(checkbox){ if(checkbox.id !== field.id ) { checkbox.setValue(['false']);}});}}

listeners.beforesubmit: function(dialog) { var multiField = dialog.findByType('mtmulticompositefield')[0], prefix = multiField.fieldNamePrefix, fieldItems = dialog.findByType('mtmulticompositefielditem'), currentTime = new Date().getTime(), i=1, isSelected = false, firstCheckbox; fieldItems.forEach( function(fieldItem){ var uniqueIdentifierField = fieldItem.find('name',prefix + fieldItem.name + '/' + 'uniqueIdentifier')[0], defaultTabField = fieldItem.find('name',prefix + fieldItem.name + '/'+'defaultTab')[0]; if(uniqueIdentifierField.getValue() === '') { uniqueIdentifierField.setValue('' + currentTime + i); } if(defaultTabField.getValue()[0]==='true') { isSelected = true; } i++; }); if(!isSelected) { if(fieldItems.length > 0){var firstCheckbox = dialog.find('name',prefix + fieldItems[0].name+'/'+'defaultTab')[0]; firstCheckbox.setValue(['true']);} } }
